Java configuration optionsData Collector environment fileData CollectorJava configuration optionsYou can edit the environment file, sdc-env.sh, to add or update Java configuration options. The environment configuration file includes the following Java configuration options:
SDC_PRE_CLASSPATH Defines the path to Java classes that you can use in custom stages such as the JavaScript or Jython Evaluator. Classes in this list load before those in the post-classpath list.
SDC_POST_CLASSPATH Defines the path to Java classes that you can call from custom stages such as the JavaScript or Jython Evaluator. Classes in this list load after those in the pre-classpath list.
SDC_JAVA_OPTS Defines additional Java configuration options for the . By default, this property includes the heap size for the .
